EcoPy - Ecological Data Analysis in Python
=================================

EcoPy contains numerous numerical and statistical techniques for working with and analyzing multiivariate data. Although designed with ecologists in mind, many of the functions and features are widely applicable. In general, it focuses on multivariate data analysis, which can be useful in any field, but with particular attention to those methods widely used in ecology. This website contains documentation and examples for all functions.

Version
=======

Current Version - 0.0.5

Installing EcoPy
=============

Need to do
